definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Thus, librarians rightfully should be treated as if they were providing any product or service.
sentences.chinese: 因此，圖書館員就應當被作爲某種產品或服務來對待。

sentences.english: Of course, there are those librarians who think libraries already do it better than bookstores.
sentences.chinese: 當然，也有圖書館員認爲圖書館現在做的比書店好。

sentences.english: Drafting a system for the accreditation of the continuing education of the librarians.
sentences.chinese: 研擬圖書館員繼續教育的認可制度。

sentences.english: This lawyer’s skill is very useful to me as a reference librarian.
sentences.chinese: 律師的技巧對我做好法律圖書館員而言，大有助益。

sentences.english: Librarians Have No Monopoly on the Activities They Claim
sentences.chinese: 圖書館員所從事的活動沒有專屬性。

sentences.english: The librarian asked the students to work quietly on their research projects.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館員要求學生安靜地做他們的研究計畫。

sentences.english: The advent of the information epoch demands to remold the librarians.
sentences.chinese: 信息時代的到來，要求重新塑造圖書館員的形象。

sentences.english: The sciences are the perfect place to test bookless libraries, librarians say.
sentences.chinese: 科學是測試無書圖書館的最佳領域，圖書館員說。

sentences.english: After Mike leaves, Paul decides to ask for help from a librarian.
sentences.chinese: 麥可離開後，保羅決定像圖書館員尋求協助。

sentences.english: Librarians in the field are actively trying to figure out the right balance.
sentences.chinese: 實踐中的圖書館員正在積極行動，試圖實現平衡。

sentences.english: Programming them to self-destruct after 26 checkouts is tantamount to asking librarians to embrace entropy.
sentences.chinese: 26次借閱後自毀的程序相當於讓圖書館員們信奉熵。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
Guang3 dong1 Wai4 yu3 Wai4 mao4 Da4 xue2

definition: seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
